activities.linkedServiceName: <Name of the linked service used by the activity>

typeProperties.scriptPath: <Alternatively, upload the script to a blob location and specify the path>

scheduler.frequency: <Specifies the time unit for data slice production. Supported frequency:Minute, Hour, Day, Week, Month>
scheduler.interval: <Specifies the interval within the defined frequency. For example, frequency set to 'Hour' and interval set to 1 indicates that new data slices should be produced hourly>

properties.start: <The start date-time of the duration in which data processing will occur or the data slices will be processed. Example : 2014-05-01T00:00:00Z>
properties.end: <The end date-time of the duration in which data processing will occur or the data slices will be processed. Example: 2014-05-05T00:00:00Z>
